text:
study demonstrates the worse performance and the increase in computational cost of machine
learning and deep learning methods for univariate time series forecasting for both one-step and
multi-step forecasts.
These ﬁndings strongly encourage the use of classical methods, such as ETS, ARIMA, and
others as a ﬁrst step before more elaborate methods are explored, and requires that the results
from these simpler methods be used as a baseline in performance that more elaborate methods
